Keywords: Codex , Fantastic Four , Monster , Mystical
Real Name: Alejandra Jones
Special Powers
TEMPORARILY SENT BACK BY JOHNNY BLAZE, KING OF HELL: When Ghost Rider would be KO'd for the first time, instead turn her to any click # from 1 to 5. The next time she takes damage from an opponent's attack, KO her. Protected: Pulse Wave.
THE GUARDIAN PHANTASMA: Defend, Energy Shield/Deflection, Toughness, Willpower. // Adjacent friendly characters of equal or lower points or that share a keyword with Ghost Rider can use Energy Shield/Deflection.

Comments
February 20, 2022
tidge
This dial was never "not good", but it has grown on me as a result of many subsequently released pieces that share keywords, or can grant additional keywords. The 50-point cost is "just right" for many different game effects for example: Horsemen of HoX Apocalypse, Recruit of WotR Dr. Strange, and the "2021" OP Team-Up Card for Spider-Man can be used to give this piece FOUR team abilities (F4, Mystics, X-Men, Spider-Man Ally) when played on certain "New Fantastic Four" teams. The initial avoidance of KO is incredibly useful because of the "pick-a-click" aspect of the subsequent return.
February 24, 2021
Goop
Defend and sharing ESD for only 50pts is a great deal. I probably wouldn't want to be charging with her offensively. Put her in the back behind your team and let them come to her. She takes a real hit under the new rules not being able to push her to that second click.
January 6, 2021
Yarisdriver
The reprint of the sculpt is ok. Wanted a more heavy dial.

RockyRaccoon
Can't believe she doesn't have mystics :(
July 30, 2020
vamroc
We'll be seeing this Ghost Rider on a lot of Avengers teams since that fifty point Cap can make him an Avenger and Ghost Rider's Defensive power grants ESD to those that share a Keyword with Ghost Rider
